title: Haunted East Los Angeles
description: Haunted East Los Angeles invites you to take a tour of the most haunted locations in this incredible town. The book includes chapters Evergreen Cemetery, Stevenson Middle School, Casa Del Mexicano, Linda Vista Community Hospital and the "Night Stalker" Richard Ramirez. Tales of devil worship, spirit children, ouija boards, poltergeists, graveyard apparitions, death and love fill the pages of Haunted East Los Angeles.
author: Mario Becerra
